sense.gloss: to use (a tool, method, etc.), to make use of, to put to use
to use (a person, animal, puppet, etc.), to employ, to handle, to manage, to manipulate
to use (time, money, etc.), to spend, to consume
messenger, bearer, errand boy, errand girl
use, usage, user, trainer, tamer, charmer
way of using (something), way to use, how to use, usage, use
way of handling (employees, subordinates, etc.), way of treating, treatment, management
use, exercise (of one's right, authority, power, etc.)
using freely, making full use of, having a good command of

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑天使↑↓てんし↓のような↑人↑↓ひと↓だ！
あぁいらいらする・・・↑今↑↓いま↓やパソコンを↑使↑↓つか↓うたびに↑頭痛↑↓ずつう↓がするよ。
sdata.e: So annoying... Now I get a headache whenever I use the computer!

sdata.j: このような↑辞書↑↓じしょ↓には、「↑冷蔵庫↑↓れいぞうこ↓」という↑言葉↑↓ことば↓を↑使↑↓つか↓った↑例文↑↓れいぶん↓が↑少↑↓すく↓なくとも2つは↑載↑↓の↓っているはずだ。
sdata.e: In a dictionary like this one there should be at least two sentences with "fridge".

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓が↑六↑↓ろく↓↑歳↑↓さい↓のときタイプライターの↑使↑↓つか↓い↑方↑↓かた↓を↑学↑↓まな↓び、↑手↑↓て↓で↑書↑↓か↓くことを↑学↑↓まな↓ぶ↑必要↑↓ひつよう↓などないと↑先生↑↓せんせい↓に↑言↑↓い↓った。
sdata.e: At the age of six he had learned to use the typewriter and told the teacher that he did not need to learn to write by hand.

sdata.j: ↑国王↑↓こくおう↓はいつも↑自分↑↓じぶん↓を↑褒↑↓ほ↓めるおべっか↑使↑↓づか↓いにうんざりしていたので↑彼↑↓かれ↓らを↑遠↑↓とお↓くへ↑飛↑↓と↓ばした。
sdata.e: The king was tired of his sycophants always praising him, so he sent them away.

sdata.j: ↑勝手↑↓かって↓に↑何↑↓なん↓でも↑使↑↓つか↓って。
↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑暴力↑↓ぼうりょく↓↑行使↑↓こうし↓を↑正当↑↓せいとう↓↑化↑↓か↓することができますか。
sdata.e: Can you justify the use of violence?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑辞書↑↓じしょ↓の↑使↑↓つか↓い↑方↑↓かた↓を↑知↑↓し↓っていますか。
sdata.e: Do you know how to use a dictionary?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑辞書↑↓じしょ↓の↑使↑↓つか↓い↑方↑↓かた↓を↑学↑↓まな↓ぶべきだ。
sdata.e: You should learn how to use your dictionary.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑私↑↓わたし↓の↑新↑↓あたら↓しい↑車↑↓くるま↓を↑使↑↓つか↓ってもよい。
sdata.e: You may use my new car.
